challenge.name: Dual Legacy 69 Challenge
challenge.legacy_goal: Bridge between computing eras through code

personal_message.to_future_self: Remember the sound of the 56k modem and the magic of first 'Hello World'
personal_message.motivation: To preserve 25 years of computing history while building the future
personal_message.promise: I will complete all 69 days and create something meaningful for the next generation
